scripts.prod-build: node-sass src/scss -o dist/css --output-style compressed & babel src --out-file dist/js/upds.min.js --ignore '**/*.test.js'
scripts.staging-build: node-sass src/scss -o dist/staging/css --output-style compressed & babel src --out-file dist/staging/js/upds.min.js --ignore '**/*.test.js'
scripts.watch: node-sass src/scss -o dist/staging/css --watch & babel src --watch --out-file dist/staging/js/upds.min.js --ignore '**/*.test.js'
